template.name: po_quote_reminder
template.description: PO quotation remainder mail to supplier
template.subject: Reminder for quotation (RFQ #{{po_number}})
template.html_content:
Dear {{supplier_name}},

We at {{company_name}} would like to ask for the price quote of the attached a list of items.

We are looking forward to hear from you.


Sincerely,
{{company_name}}
